features_textures_description: You can enable as many packs as you want, but if multiple packs replace the same file the order matters. For example if two packs replace the grass, the first pack in the list will take precedence.
features_textures_invalidPack: Invalid texture pack format, ensure it contains the correct top-level folder and valid metadata.
features_textures_moveUp_buttonAlt: move texture pack up in order
gameControls_always_use_newest_tooltip: When this box is checked and your active version is out-of-date, you'll be prompted to update before playing.
gameControls_button_compile_helpText: إعادة بناء اللعبة. (أي بعد تعديل رمز مصدر OpenGOAL)
gameControls_button_copyExecutableComman: For running the game outside the launcher.
gameControls_button_decompile_helpText: Extracts game assets (ie. to apply texture replacements)
gameControls_button_features_textures_di: Texture pack feature disabled, update your launcher and tooling version
gameControls_button_uninstall_confirmati: Are you sure you want to uninstall?
gameControls_button_uninstall_helpText: This will not delete any saves or settings
gameControls_noToolingSet_subheader: Head over to the following settings page to download the latest release
gameControls_warning_vccVersion_headerA: Your Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime is out of date
gameControls_warning_vccVersion_headerB: Due to recent changes, the tools may fail to launch if this is not updated, please update using the link below and restart your machine.
gameUpdate_versionMismatch_nextSteps: You can either update the game to this new version (no save data will be lost) or you can rollback your active version to match
gameUpdate_versionMismatch_title: تم الكشف عن عدم تطابق الإصدار!
help_description_createAnIssue: You can either ask a question on our Discord, or create a GitHub issue with as much detail as possible.
help_description_duplicateReminder: In either location, please do a quick search to see if the question has already been answered before
help_foreword: If you are reporting an issue or asking for help, download the following support package and attach it in your Discord thread or GitHub issue.
requirements_button_bypass_warning_1: If you believe the requirement checks are false, you can bypass them.
requirements_button_bypass_warning_2: However, if you are wrong you should expect issues installing or running the game!
requirements_cpu_avxExplanation_1: This cannot be fixed without upgrading to a newer CPU
requirements_cpu_avxExplanation_2: AVX support has been fairly standard since 2011
requirements_cpu_doesNotSupportAVX: Your CPU does not support AVX
requirements_cpu_unableToCheckAVX: Unable to verify if your CPU supports AVX
requirements_disk_unableToCheckSpace: Unable to check if drive has enough space to install
requirements_disk_enoughSpace_jak1: Drive has atleast 4GB of free space
requirements_disk_notEnoughSpace_jak1: Drive does not have atleast 4GB of free space
requirements_disk_enoughSpace_jak2: Drive has atleast 11GB of free space
requirements_disk_notEnoughSpace_jak2: Drive does not have atleast 11GB of free space
requirements_gpu_avxExplanation_1_postLi: to see if it should be supported
requirements_gpu_avxExplanation_2: You can attempt to upgrade your GPU drivers
requirements_gpu_avxExplanation_3: Otherwise, you will need to upgrade your GPU, most GPUs since 2012 support it
requirements_gpu_doesNotSupportOpenGL: Your GPU does not support OpenGL 4.3
requirements_gpu_unableToCheckOpenGL: Unable to verify if your GPU supports OpenGL 4.3
requirements_windows_vccRuntimeInstalled: Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime is installed
requirements_windows_cantCheckIfVccRunti: Unable to check if Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime is installed
requirements_windows_vccRuntimeNotInstal: Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime is not installed or is out of date
requirements_windows_vccRuntimeExplanati: A recent version of the Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime is required to run the game
Download the latest Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime here
requirements_notMet_header: لسوء الحظ، النظام الخاص بك لا يستوفي الحد الأدنى من المتطلبات أو لم نتمكن من التحقق منها
settings_general_button_resetSettings_co: هل أنت متأكد من أنك تريد إعادة تعيين إعدادات المشغل الخاص بك؟ سيؤدي هذا إلى إعادة تعيين دليل التثبيت الخاص بك وأي إعدادات أخرى قمت بتغييرها. هذا لن يؤثر على ملفات اللعبة الخاصة بك.
settings_general_installationDir_helper: Changing this will require you to reinstall the games and tooling
settings_decompiler_toolingVersionTooLow: Tooling version of atleast 0.2.14 is required for these settings
settings_versions_header: تكوين نسخة الأدوات النشطة الخاصة بك
settings_versions_invalidReleaseWithReas: Release marked as invalid for the following reasons:
setup_prompt_selectFolderWithISO: Select a folder with your ISO's data extracted
setup_prompt_selectISO: Select your legitimately obtained ISO File
splash_deleteOldInstallDir: لم تعد هناك حاجة إلى مجلد التثبيت القديم، هل تريد حذفه؟
temp_jak2_indev_header: Jak II is Currently in Development
temp_jak2_indev_subheader: In the meantime, check out our latest progress reports showcasing what we've accomplished so far
update_description: عرض التغييرات أدناه وانقر على الزر للتحديث إلى أحدث إصدار. سيتم إعادة تشغيل المشغل عند الانتهاء.
gameControls_toolingTooOld_header: Tooling Version Does Not Support Game!
gameControls_toolingTooOld_subheader: Head over to the following settings page to download the latest release
gameControls_beta_headerB: You will encounter minor bugs and instability.
gameControls_beta_issueTracker_linkPreTe: For a list of all known issues, see
gameControls_beta_bugReport_linkPreText: To submit a non-duplicate bug report, see
settings_mods_warning_header: Mods are provided by third-parties and are not vetted, endorsed or supported by the official team.
settings_mods_warning_description_part1: They can run arbitrary unverified code on your system so only install mods from sources that you trust!
settings_mods_warning_description_part2: If you run into a problem with the mod you will likely have to reach out to it's author and not the OpenGOAL team.
features_mods_no_sources: You have no mod sources configured or they are unavailable!
features_mods_not_supported_platform_1: Mod not supported on your platform
features_mods_not_supported_platform_2: Ask the author to fix this!
toasts_modSourceDuplicateName: Mod source has the same display name as one you already have added
toasts_unableToRetrieveModDownloadURL: Unable to retrieve mod download URL
